title: _livecasino.io_
author: _livecasino.io_
content: Hello all,Livecasino.io is back again with another  FANTASTIC OFFER for the BitcoinTalk Community!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo#21 is for 1 mBTC free bet for Evolution Lightning Roulette and will work like this:Reward1mBTC free bet on Evolution Lightning Roulette game!How?Opt-in by sending PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #21 has PM subject to facilitate the management)Make at least 1 depositWager at least 10 mBTC on any games at livecasino.ioPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post to Sunday 3rd July, 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the rewardThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 4th July, 17:00 GMTFree bet has 1x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the freebetNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardWe hope you enjoy!Fl√°vio from livecasino.io team!
